Graveyard foraging
Main Skill: Foraging
Max Efficiency: 225%

You tread through the graveyard and look for unique things out of place that have come loose from the floods in the area. It isn't grave robbing if it isn't still in the grave, right?

The Graveyard foraging activity is a Foraging activity.

Location

This activity can be done at the following location:

  • Wraithwater in Wallisia

Visibility

This activity is always visible.

Requirement

Skill Level Requirements:

  • At least Foraging lvl. 55.

Experience Information

Skill Base

Steps 		Base

Secondary Drops

Each of the secondary drops is rolled independently of the others.

Item Name Item Type Quantity Chance Odds Base
Rate 		W.E.A.R.
Foraging chest Container 1 0.400% ~1 in 250 27,000 steps 12,000 steps
Haunted teddy bear Collectible 1 0.200% ~1 in 500 54,000 steps 24,000 steps
